alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:54PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Washington and southeastern Wayne Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1254 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Buckatunna, or 12 miles southeast of Waynesboro, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millry and Buckatunna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
